page.title: 07INDUSTRIES OF BETHERSDEN(1)
page.content: THE VILLAGE OF BETHERSDEN HAS A CONSIDERABLE AMOUNT OF LOCAL INDUSTRY. MANY OF IT'S PRODUCTS ARE WELL KNOWN THROUGHOUT THE COUNTRY.A ROYAL CHARTER HAS BEEN GRANTED TO A COMPANY WHICH PRODUCES SECTIONAL WOODEN BUILDINGS, MAINLY HOUSES READY FOR SITE ERECTION.A FIRM PRODUCES IRON GATES, SECURITY GRILLS,REPRODUCTION IRONWORK USED FOR RESTORATION WORK EG. IRON RAILINGS IN LONDON.ANOTHER MAKES GLASSFIBRE INDUSTRIAL MOULDINGS AND BATH TUBS OF ALL SHAPES SPECIALLY DESIGNED TO MEET THE CUSTOMER'S OWN REQUIREMENT.AN ENGINEERING FIRM BUILDS PROTOTYPE MACHINES.PINE AND OTHER TIMBERS ARE USED TO MAKE SPECIALIST DESIGNED FITTED KITCHENS.THIS COMPANY ALSO PRODUCES OTHER HOUSEHOLD FURNITURE.AN UP AND COMING FIRM MAKES AND RESTORES WOODEN TOYS BUT IS BEST KNOWN FOR REPRODUCTION ROCKING HORSES.
